评论详情: This is a Christmas gift.  I  opened package and the shirt looked pretty.

评论概述: Terrible material, doesn't look like the picture
评论详情: I want to love this jacket, but the material is really bad, the garment is shapeless and not true to size, and the colors appear much more dull and fake-looking than in the picture. Texture-wise, think cheap Halloween costume material. Color-wise think super cheap digital type print. The print coverage isn't good and there were flaws. I wanted to love it, but it's just extremely cheaply made and not at all as pictured. Considering returning, but it's really too late to order something else and get it in on time for the holidays. So... buyer beware. If you're sensitive to cheap fabrics this is not the garment for you.

super cute, washed it tonight and it held up well. fits true to size

I was probably too excited for this hoodie. The color is great, but the fabric is low quality and the stitching a bit sloppy. It is very thin and feels exactly like any other fast fashion hoodie does. Kind of a slippery fabric, definitely not sweatshirt material. Disappointed.
True to size. Super soft and comfortable. Not cheap feeling or looking
This was exactly what I was looking for. It is lightweight and fits great.

评论概述: Scratchy and doesn’t hold up well
评论详情: So, I like the look of it, but I’ve had it a while now, and I don’t think I’d recommend this one.  It’s not comfortable to wear- the seams are stiff inside (like on your arms, and around the neck) and the fabric thinned a lot with washes and, my gosh, does it ‘pill’ a lot.  I really like the tie dye style used, and the overall aesthetic *looks* good, but that's about the only positive thing I have to say. It just sucks to wear.
It's a great lightweight hooded jacket. I get compliments when I wear it.
Bought for me...fits extremely tight, gave it my 11 year old daughter
Great colors

评论概述: Radiate Comfort and Style: YOCUR Women's Tie Dye Crewneck Pullover Shirt
评论详情: The YOCUR Women's Tie Dye Crewneck Pullover Shirt is a stunning piece that effortlessly combines comfort and style. Crafted from lightweight and breathable fabric, this shirt is perfect for all-day wear, keeping you cool and comfortable in any season. The softness of the material feels like a gentle caress against your skin, making it a joy to wear from morning to night.  One of the standout features of this pullover shirt is its stretchy fabric, which offers a perfect fit and allows for freedom of movement. Whether you're running errands, lounging at home, or enjoying outdoor activities, this shirt moves with you, providing flexibility and comfort every step of the way. The crewneck design adds a classic touch, while the tie dye pattern adds a pop of color and personality, making it a beautiful addition to any wardrobe.  In addition to its comfort and stretch, the YOCUR Women's Tie Dye Crewneck Pullover Shirt is undeniably beautiful. The vibrant tie dye pattern creates a striking visual effect that is sure to turn heads wherever you go. Whether you pair it with leggings for a casual day out or dress it up with jeans for a night on the town, this shirt exudes effortless style and charm. Overall, the YOCUR Women's Tie Dye Crewneck Pullover Shirt is a must-have for anyone looking to elevate their casual wardrobe with comfort and flair.

I ordered a XXL I wished that it was a little loose but the more I wear it will stretch.  It runs a bit smaller than I’m used to but the color and quality is so above the cut that I wish to keep my beautiful sweat shirt.

I don’t know why I order tops off of Amazon. They never fit properly. This was a large and it fit my niece who is a small. Always check the seller. If it’s from China order two sizes larger. Never again!!

This is not a heavy sweatshirt but it isn't thin or see through. Mine looks exactly like the picture. I'm fairly short (5' 1/2") and so many tops are too long on me. This is perfect...just a bit below my waist but nothing shows if I lift my arms. It washed up beautifully; I hang my clothes to dry. A few minutes then in the dryer with a dryer sheet and it's soft and looks great.

This hoodie was very cute and I received several compliments on it!  It was not sweatshirt  material however, and had absolutely no give or stretch to it.  I usually like my sweatshirts big and stretchy, since this one was not, you may want to go up a size.

I love the color and fit of this hoodie.  However, I have washed and worn it 3 times now and it is covered in little pilly balls of fabric.  It also collects ALL the hair from all the clothes in the dryer.  They don't just attach to it, the hair ends up woven throughout all of the fabric and it's a whole pain to remove them.  I would not buy again.
